Klant wakes up.

Klant: Wha? Yeah, I guess so.

He follows Beachcomber...

=
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: robertdahl 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 29, 2001 1:54 AM
  Subject: Re: Curiosity/ Crea=
tion: 2271


  Firedrill looked back to Redhot, not totally getting the jok=
e, but
  smilling so as not to hurt his friends feelings. "Then maybe we sh=
ould
  put my little story on hold, ans check out our partners." he said,
 =
 transforming into his police car mode, as his trunk opened up. "Will you
 =
 still need a lift?" he asked.

  Beachcomber stood up from his study on a =
alien form of insect, and
  transformed as well. "Yeah, that would be wise =
Firedrill. Coming Klant?"
  he asked.

 subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
